mapper.select: SELECT n.n_id, n.u_id, n.c_code, n.target_exchange, lr.deal_bas_r FROM notification n JOIN (SELECT C_CODE, deal_bas_r, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C_CODE ORDER BY RATE_DATE DESC, ANNOTIME DESC) AS rn FROM noticeexchangerate ) lr ON n.C_CODE = lr.C_CODE AND lr.rn = 1 AND n.TARGET_EXCHANGE BETWEEN lr.deal_bas_r * 0.998 AND lr.deal_bas_r * 1.002
